resources.string: Please describe the current problems (it helps us to solve the problems easier).
Please fill in the current aircraft model
It\'s recommended to allow PotensicPro to access the Storage Permission for your Photos and Videos to save and browse files.
PotensicPro Requests Access to your Photos and Videos
Allow PotensicPro to access your External Storage to save photos, videos and flight records during flight.
Allow PotensicPro to access your Storage and Location to obtain location information, save photos, videos and flight records during flight.
Allow PotensicPro to access your Location to obtain location information, display the current location of you and the drone on the map during flight.
Allow PotensicPro to access your Storage and Files as current operation requires access to save and read files in storage.
Allow PotensicPro to access your Storage and Files as current operation requires access to share files in storage.

1. Do not disconnect or operate the drone and remote controller unless prompted. \n2. Ensure that your phone remains unlocked and stays on the upgrade interface in PotensicPro App; avoid making or answering calls during this process. \n3. Prior to upgrade, ensure the gimbal protector has been removed and there are no obstacles obstructing the gimbal\'s movement.
Long press the power button to start the drone.
Double press the power button to enter the frequency pairing mode.
Intelligent Flight can only be activated mid-flight.
In non-GPS mode, Intelligent Flight is inaccessible.
The attitude angle is too large!
Abnormal battery level, unable to take off
The battery pressure difference is too large, triggering return home
The battery cell is abnormal and cannot take off, please contact after-sales service
The battery jumps abnormally, which triggers the smart return home, please restart the drone
Safe flight requires a core temperature≥%d℃
The battery temperature is too high to take off!
Oops! Interference detected, please change your location and restart your devices, then try upgrading again.
Remote controller signal weak, keep away from the interference and re-calibrate, and make sure the remote controller is within 3m/9.84ft of the drone when calibrating.
Calibration succeeded, please wait for the gimbal to restart!
Before taking photos/videos, please allow access to camera permissions to ensure normal use.
You have not yet agreed to PotensicPro\'s use agreement and privacy policy, and PotensicPro cannot be used.
While performing geomagnetic calibration, place the drone at least 1.5m (4.92 ft) above the ground before proceeding.
If connected, this page will be skipped automatically.
After the connection is completed, the main interface can directly enter the flight interface
Connect the mobile device and the remote control with USB port
Turn on the aircraft and remote control
Check the WiFi name in the user manual
Turn on your cell phone and search drone WiFi signals.
Take out the fixed bracket of the gimbal to make sure that the gimbal can work normally.

1.Please match the correct blades and arm according to the marks CW and CCW. 

2.Fix the motor, press the blade and rotate it about 90° (CW means counterclockwise, CCW means clockwise). 

3.Lift the blades gently to check if they will fall off.
Please wait with patience, the matching time between the remote control and the phone will last about 30s.
Use the cable to connect the mobile device and the remote control.
Install the joystick and unfold the antenna.
Long press the power button of the remote control to turn on the remote control.
Place the mobile phone on the remote control.

1.Please insert battery and push it to the end, then hear Ka. 

2.Turn on battery: Please click the power button to active it, then press it until heard a sound.

1.Please make sure the aircraft is turned on. 

2.Connect to the WiFi named Potensic xxxxxx, the default password is 12345678 

3.After the connection is successful, return to the PotensicPro APP for the continue operation.

1.Please make sure the aircraft is turned on. 

2.Connect to the WiFi named Potensic Falcon_xxxxxx, the default password is 12345678 

3.After the connection is successful, return to the PotensicPro APP for the continue operation.

1.Please make sure the aircraft is turned on. 

2.Connect to the WiFi named Potensic Dmini1_xxxxxx, the default password is 12345678 

3.After the connection is successful, return to the PotensicPro APP for the continue operation.
The current GPS signal is weak, please move to an open outdoor place to fly the aircraft.

Descending Return is to reduce the flight altitude during the return process, and when the flight altitude descends to 120m (393.7ft), the drone will automatically switch to regular return. Descending Return will reduce the total power consumption of the return, and is recommended in a windy environment.

1. Check if the remote controller is powered on. After powering on, the connection will take about 30s. \n2. After following Step 1, still fail to connect. Tap Method Button to check the connection procedures.

1. Check whether the remote controller is powered on. After powering on, connect it to the mobile phone with a compatible cable. \n2. After following Step 1, still fail to connect. Tap Method Button to check the connection procedures.
Camera upgrade failed, please restart the aircraft and try to upgrade again.

The file is uploaded, and the camera is about to start upgrading. Please do not turn off during the upgrading. The camera will autorestart after the upgrade is successful, which takes about 2 minutes.
Unable to save file. Ready to exit upgrading, please try again later.
The memory occupied by upgrading firmware is too large to upgrade at present. Please try again later.
The camera is upgraded successfully, and the camera will be restarted. Please check the connection status after restarting for 2 minutes, and then perform other operations.

1.During the upgrading, don not exit the App or perform other operations. Keep on the current upgrade page and the phone needs unlocked screen state. \n2.There will be a tone after the drone is successfully upgraded. \n3.Camera upgrading takes about 2 min and 30 sec
Are you sure you want to quit your current account?
The selected file will be deleted from the SD card.
Please allow the access to the photo album.
Mobile phone storage space is insufficient, download failed!
Verification code error, please check and try again.
The verification code is invalid. Please retrieve the verification code again.
The drone triggered an emergency stop, please restart the aircraft before use.
After sliding confirmation, the aircraft will stop returning and hover in the current position.
After sliding confirmation, the aircraft will stop taking off and hover in the current position.
The system is being upgraded. If you quit, the upgrading will be interrupted. Are you sure you want to quit?
Feedback failed due to network reasons. Please try again later.
Feedback suggestions have been uploaded successfully.

1.Ensure that the drone battery power is more than 30% left. 
2.Keep the drone on while upgrading. 
3.Make sure the drone is stationary during the upgrade process and do not perform other operations. 
4.Do not interrupt during the upgrade process,otherwise it will cause firmware incompatibility.
Aircraft upgrade failed, please restart the aircraft and try to upgrade again.
Please note before the upgrade is completed

1.During the upgrading, don not exit the App or perform other operations. Keep on the current upgrade page and the phone needs unlocked screen state. \n2.There will be a tone after the drone is successfully upgraded. \n3.flight control upgrading takes about 60 sec.
The drone upgrading is successful, please enjoy your flight.
Compass calibration requires two parts, please follow the prompts for calibration.
The flight path has been drawn, please confirm whether the flight mission is carried out or not.
After sliding the key to confirm, the drone will return to home point. To ensure safety, please avoid the surrounding obstacles.
Uploading firmware verification failed. Ready to exit the upgrading. Please try again later.
Personal information modification failed. Please try again later.

You are about to use the intelligent flight mode with the automatic flight function, which may cause drone loss or injury to others. If entering this mode, you should clearly understand that the risk will increase significantly, and you agree that you will bear all the responsibilities arising therefrom. It is recommended that you follow these tips to reduce risk at all times. \n1. Ensure that the aircraft avoids people, animals, small objects (such as branches or wires), or transparent objects (such as glass or water); \n2. Always pay attention to objects from around the aircraft and avoid accidents by manual operation.
After sliding to confirm, the drone will land at the current position. To ensure safety, please avoid the surrounding obstacles.
To start this function, please go to Settings - Privacy Location Service on the phone to turn on the positioning function.
Mobile phone positioning is not turned on!
To save this flight, click the Save button to save it.
Check to ensure the landing spot is open and free of obstacles to land the drone safely.
Launch in open field, and the drone will hover at 1.2m.
Please install Google services first. Ready to return to home interface.

It is unable to obtain your correct position information, which will cause a large positioning error of the aircraft. It is recommended to allow the permission of position through Setting - Potensic Pro - Position.
The permission is not fully opened!
The aircraft is not connected yet and cannot perform this operation. Please connect the aircraft.
Failed to reset password, please try again later.
Password reset succeeded, ready to jump to login interface
Please confirm whether to exit the current flight mission.
Confirm to exit QuickShots and start Waypoint Flight?
Confirm to exit Waypoint Flight and start QuickShots?

There is a new version of the remote control that can be updated. Please shut down the remote control manually, then press and hold the take-off key and power button together to turn on the remote control!

New firmware of the remote controller is available now. To upgrade the remote controller, please manually turn off the remote controller, then hold the camera button and the power button at the same time!
After confirming the restart, the App will show the new guide content again.
Encountering strong wind during RTH. Please lower the flight altitude as soon as possible.
After formatting, the files on the SD card will be permanently deleted. Confirm to format?
Based on the current estimated flight distance, the remaining battery can only meet the return demand, hence the intelligent return under low battery has been activated.
Encountering strong wind! Please lower the flight altitude and initiate RTH as soon as possible.
Due to network reasons, the proposal submission failed. Please try again later.
Your suggestions have been uploaded successfully.
After sliding to confirm, the drone will automatically take off to 1.2 meters and then hover. To ensure a better experience, please fly in an open place.
Please allow the access to the location
You haven\'t alllowed the location authorization. Click OK and go to settings to allow the authorization.

1. Before upgrading, ensure that the smart battery power is greater than 30%, and the remote control power is greater than or equal to 2 bars. 
2. During the smart battery upgrade process, please make sure that the drone, remote control and cell phone are all powered on and connected. 
3. During the upgrade of the smart battery, distance of the drone and remote controller must be kept within 1m and cannot be moved. 
4. During the upgrade process of the smart battery, please do not do irrelevant operations or interrupt the upgrade, otherwise it might cause the upgrade anomaly.
Smart battery has failed to upgrade, please try again later.

1. During the smart battery upgrade process, cell phone needs to remain unlocked and stay on the upgrade interface, please do not operate or exit the APP. \n2. There will be a prompt sound after the smart battery upgrade is successful, and if the upgrade fails, it will prompt to re-upgrade. \n3. It takes about 30 seconds to upgrade the smart battery.
During the smart battery upgrade process, cell phone needs to remain unlocked and stay on the upgrade interface, please do not operate or exit the APP.
Smart battery has been successfully upgraded, enjoy your flight!

1. Ensure that the aircraft battery power is more than 30%. 
2. Ensure the aircraft remains power-on during upgrade. 
3. Ensure the remote control remains power-on during upgrade. 
4. Do not move the aircraft when upgrading. 
5. Make sure to insert the SD card.
There is a problem with firmware transfer, please restart your device and APP and try to update again!

1. During the upgrade process, the phone cannot exit the app or perform other operations. It needs to be kept on the current upgrade page and kept in the screen-unlocked state. 
2. There will be a tone when the camera is upgraded successfully. 
3. Do not unplug the USB cable during the upgrade process. 
4. Do not unplug the SD card during the upgrade process. 
5. Camera upgrade takes about 2 minutes and 30 seconds.
Does not meet the upgrading conditions

1. Ensure that the aircraft battery power is more than 30%. 
2. Ensure that the aircraft is power on during the upgrade. 
3. Don't move the aircraft during upgrade. 
4. Do not interrupt the upgrade process, otherwise the upgrade may be abnormal.

1. Do not disconnect or operate the drone and remote controller unless prompted. \n2. Ensure that your phone remains unlocked and stays on the upgrade interface in PotensicPro App; kindly avoid making or answering calls during this process.

1. During the upgrade process, the phone cannot exit the app or perform other operations. You need to keep it on the current upgrade page and keep phone screen unlocked. \n2. Do not unplug the USB cable during the upgrade process.

1. Ensure that the remote control battery power is more than 50%. 
2. Don't move the drone during the upgrade. 
3. Do not interrupt the upgrade process, otherwise the upgrade may be abnormal. 
4. Stable transmission of mobile USB cable.
Image transmission upgrade failed, please try again later.

1. During the upgrade process, the phone cannot exit the app or perform other operations. It needs to be kept on the current upgrade page and kept in the screen-unlocked state. 
2. It will restart after successful upgrade. 
3. Do not unplug the USB cable during the upgrade process. 
4. The upgrade time of image transmission is about 2 minutes and 30 seconds.

1. During the upgrade process, the phone cannot exit the app or perform other operations. It needs to be kept on the current upgrade page and kept in the screen-unlocked state. \n2. It will restart after successful upgrade. \n3. Do not unplug the USB cable during the upgrade process.
Successful image transmission upgrade, enjoy your flight!

1. Ensure that the drone's battery level is more than 30%. 
2. Keep the drone powered on during upgrade. 
3. Keep the remote controller powered on during upgrade. 
4. Do not move the drone during upgrade. 
5. Do not interrupt the upgrade process, otherwise the upgrade may fail.
PTZ upgrade failed, please try again later.

1. During the upgrade process, the phone cannot exit the app or perform other operations.It needs to be kept on the current upgrade page and kept in the screen-unlocked state. 
2. When the gimbal upgrade succeeds or fails, the footlights stop the cycle flashing. 
3. Do not unplug the USB cable during the upgrade process. 
4. After upgrading the gimbal, the gimbal will start automatically and the gimbal will be calibrated automatically. Do not interrupt the gimbal self inspection. 
5. It takes about 70 seconds to upgrade.
PTZ upgrade succeed, enjoy your flight!
1. Ensure that the remote control battery power is more than 50%. \n2. Don\'t move the drone during the upgrade. \n3. Stable transmission of mobile USB cable.
Remote control upgrade failed, please try again later.

1. During the upgrade process, the phone cannot exit the app or perform other operations. You need to keep it on the current upgrade page and keep phone screen unlocked. 
2. The remote control will shut down automatically after the upgrade. 
3. Do not unplug the USB cable during the upgrade process. 
4. Remote control upgrade takes about 5-10S.
Remote control upgrade succeed, enjoy your flight!
Upload timed out due to failed network. About to exit the upgrade. Please try again later
TOF upgrade failed. Please try again later.
TOF upgrade success, please enjoy your flight experience!
Please choose the way to upload pictures.
Failed to submit the information. You can re-edit it in Me
After skipping information filling, you can edit and fill in again inMe
1. Check if the drone is powered on. \n2. Connect to Wi-Fi: “Potensic xxxxxxxx”, the default password is 12345678.

1. Check if the remote controller is powered on. After powering on, the connection will take about 30s. \n2. After following Step 1, still fail to connect. Tap Method Button to check the connection procedures.
The video transmission signal is weak. Please adjust the RC antenna angle or ascend the drone accordingly.
出了点小问题，请稍后重试
您正在使用移动网络，继续播放将消耗流量
Please connect the aircraft, enter the operation interface to upgrade.

New firmware detected. Tap the Download button to download. For better flight experience, it is recommended to download the latest firmware immediately. After connecting the drone, enter the flight interface to upgrade.

New firmware detected. Tap the Download button to download. For better flight experience, it is recommended to download the latest firmware immediately. After connecting the drone, enter the flight interface to upgrade.
Do not exit the current interface or cut off the network connection. The download is about to complete. Please wait patiently.
1.If the phone can receive aircraft signals.
1) After the aircraft is lost, it may hover somewhere in the air. You can try to click the automatic return button xon the remote control, please wait for about 3 minutes for aircraft returning home.
If it is found that the return direction is inconsistent with the home point, immediately stop returning and manually control the aircraft to return to the field of view to land it.
2) If the aircraft cannot be operated, please follow the navigation to move to the vicinity of the aircraft location, try to operate and find the aircraft.
1) Please find the route between the last flight location of the aircraft and the home point.
1. If the flying area is not wide and open enough, the aircraft may crash and fall somewhere, please pay attention to look around where the crash may occur.
2. When searching, please pay attention to the buzzer and indicator light emitted by the aircraft.

3. When the aircraft is disconnected, and you are looking for the aircraft, you can open the mobile phone WiFi connection page. Once the mobile phone finds the WIFI signal of the aircraft, it means that the aircraft is nearby. Try to connect to the aircraft and control the aircraft to return to land it.
Don’t worry if the aircraft is lost:
Please fill in the correct email!
A confirmation email has been sent to the %s Please follow the prompts to change the password and log in again.
Please enter your registered email address
Battery pressure difference is too large, the aircraft is triggering home returning function.
The battery pressure difference is too large, so the aircraft can’t take off.
The battery temperature is too low, please fly with caution
Data error detected, RTH is activated. Please restart the drone after landing.
The drone is about to reach the maximum limit distance, please fly carefully!
The drone is about to reach the maximum limit height, please fly carefully!
The flight distance limit has been reached. Beginner mode can be turned off in the setting!
The flight height limit has been reached. Beginner mode can be turned off in the setting!
Reading error in Gimbal RAM, please contact our after-sales service in time.
The gyroscope of the gimbal is faulty, please contact our after-sales service in time.
The camera gimbal is overloaded. Please check if there is something blocking and remove it.
Failure communication between battery and flight control!
Please confirm whether to stop the firmware download. Click OK to exit the firmware and return to the home page.
The edited content will be cleared after exiting
Thank you for your submission, we will get back to you via the App soon.
Once deleted, you won\'t be able to view the feedback and seller\'s reply. Please proceed with caution.
If your issue remains unresolved after submitting the feedback, please do not hesitate to contact us via the email above. We appreciate your support.

To better assist you with your issue, please include [where you ordered the product] and [the order ID], and provide a detailed description of your operation procedures and the encountered issue (Please input at least 10 characters, excluding numbers and symbols).
Video size should be less than 100Mb
Allow PotensicPro to access to your Camera or Photo Library to record or upload, or you won\'t be able to use the related features.
PotensicPro Would Like to Access Your Camera and Photo Library
Feedback suspened, try again in tomorrow.
Please turn off the beeping under Find My Drone interface before unlocking.
New firmware detected, please upgrade as soon as possible
PotensicPro will access your Photo Library to save and browse files.
PotensicPro Would Like to Access Your Photo Library
After adjusting the settings, click the“X”button in the upper right corner to save the settings!
The smart battery is experiencing abnormal discharging, preventing takeoff. Please replace the battery and restart the drone.

The current video transmission signal is weak, please adjust the antenna angle of the remote controller to ensure that the antenna plane is aligned with the direction of the drone to obtain a more stable video transmission quality.
The drone battery level is critically low, please charge the battery in time.
The drone battery level is low, please charge the battery in time.

You are operating the drone in a low-temperature condition hence the temperature and voltage of the battery are too low. To ensure the flight safety, the drone\'s flight power has been limited and it is recommended to return as soon as possible.
Please exit Interval Timer Shooting Mode before setting

Flying the drone over %s%s could violate local laws and regulations. You are solely responsible and liable for the operation of the drone after altering the maximum flight altitude. Potensic and its affiliate shall not be liable for any damages, whether in contract, tort (including negligence), or any other legal or equitable theory.
Low battery! Forced takeoff poses safety risks. Keep a certain distance away from the drone and operate with caution! (After tapping Confirm, the drone will take off automatically)
Please check whether the battery buckle pops out correctly. Improper installation of the battery may cause the battery to fall mid-flight.

Press the power button on the remote controller shortly to stop the current return beeping. You can enable Silent Return in Settings -> Safety. In Silent Return mode, the remote controller will no longer beep when the drone enters the RTH mode in the future.
The battery temperature is too low to activate the Sport Mode.
Abnormal battery current, unable to take off.
To ensure safety, please change the settings after returning.
Low battery! Forced take-off may result in potential safety hazard. Please be cautious!(Click to confirm and the drone will automatically take off!)
Important new firmware detected, please upgrade before use!
New firmware detected, we recommend upgrading for a better flying experience!
If your device powers off automatically, please restart it.
The device is upgrading. Do you want to exit?
Download failed. Please check the device network connection.
Firmware downloading. Please do not turn off the network or exit the APP.
New firmware available. Tap to upgrade!
Oops! Firmware upload timed out, please restart your device and try again!
SD card needs to be formatted
Drone is unlocked and motors are spinning idle

1. Do not disconnect or operate the drone and remote controller unless prompted. \n2. Ensure that your phone remains unlocked and stays on the upgrade interface in PotensicPro App; kindly avoid making or answering calls during this process.
Please note before the upgrade is completed:
Sorry! There was a problem during upgrade, please restart all devices and try again.
If you have any suggestions, please feel free to contact us! \n(%ds)
Oops! There is a problem during the upgrade!
1. Please fold the propellers and ensure no foreign objects are around the gimbal. \n2. Place the drone bottom side up on a flat horizontal surface.
Weak GPS signal, Waypoint Flight exited
Low GPS accuracy, please try again later.
In non-GPS mode, Waypoint Flight is inaccessible
Please keep drone and smartphone within 5-50m range
Tap here to customize the camera parameters
Tap here to customize the camera parameters.
Long press to enter Digital Zoom Mode
Tap here to enter the map interface. When entering the map interface for the first time, please keep Internet connection to cache the map.
Long press to enter Interval Timer Shooting Mode
Tap here to enter Intelligent Flight Modes.
You can see real-time change of attitude angle of the drone via the attitude indicator.
The drone head will lock the GPS position of the mobile phone to follow it. Click to exit this mode immediately.

When the drone is not in a level and stationary state, push both sticks to the bottom inner corner for 2 seconds to forcibly unlock the motors (It is recommended to stay at least 5m away from the drone)
Tap here to enter the flight interface
Tap here to select the drone model

The drone now is controlled by remote control. When the phone is connected with the drone, the virtual stick will be on, which means that the mobile App controls the drone. Please pay attention to the flight.
Under the following mode, the drone will follow the position of the phone and click the red X to exit.
The current mode is GPS mode. The signal strength of GPS will be displayed on the App navigation bar. When the signal is weak, please fly the drone in an open area.
Drone is under head mode. If you need to switch to headless mode, please switch it through App.
Under orbit flight mode, the drone will fly around the set position point (default radius of 10 meters, speed of 3m/s, counterclockwise), and by click the red X to exit.
Before taking off, the drone motors are locked. When the aircraft takes off, the motors will be unlocked. Motors\' status will show on the navigation bar.
Tap here to enter Intelligent Flight Modes
Under the waypoint flight mode, you can draw flight point on the map, click \"GO\" to start the flight, and click the red X to exit.
Click the return key, the aircraft will return to the home point.
Enter the intelligent menu to select Intelligent Flight and other settings
After sliding to confirm taking off, the drone will take off and hover.
Click to see how to connect to the current model
Display the connection status of the phone, drone and remote control
Please click to view the required content before the first flight
Home point, where the drone takes off
Positioning: locate the aircraft or remote control.
The red acute angle represents the head direction, and the green beam represents the lens direction.
Red dot represents the location of the remote control.

1. Secure the mobile phone on the remote controller and connect them via the adapter cable. 

2. Take out the control sticks and install them. 

3. Long press the power button to power on the remote controller.

1. Unfold the drone arms and make sure all the propellers are not crossed. 

2. Insert the smart battery and make sure the battery buckle fully pops out. 

3. Short press then long press the power button to power on the drone.

1. Unfold the rear arm firstly, and then unfold the front arm 

2. Unfold the tripod of the front arm 

3. Install the SD card 

4. Short press the power button, and then long press the power button for 2 seconds until the prompt tone appears

1. Take out the joystick from the accessory bag and install it on the remote control 

2. Unfold the remote control antenna as shown in the picture 

3. Pull down the phone holder and place the phone 

4. Long press the power button to turn on the remote control
1.Short press the battery power switch of the aircraft, then press and hold for 2 seconds, wait for 4 battery indicators turning on.
Slide up / down to adjust the camera\'s pitch
Click this key to enter the camera setting
Click this key to enter the photo album
Click this button to switch between video recording and photographing functions
Set the basic flight parameters of drone
Select the drone joystick control mode
View device information, firmware version and check upgrade
Calibrate drone and perform frequency pairing
Set up the remote controller and gimbal
The HOME point has been updated! Please pay attention to the location of the HOME point in the map.
Home point is not the takeoff point, please pay attention to the return location on the map.
Loading failed, please try again later!
For being used normally, the drone needs to obtain your location. Please allow access to the location information.
Dangerous at low altitude, Sport Mode exited!

Upload flight logs for continuous optimization of flight experience.
After the account is cancelled, the account and related content will be deleted, please operate it cautiously.
Are you sure to cancel your account?
Please connect to the cellular data network to switch the map mode.

You are helping to make OpenStreetMap and Mapbox maps better by contributing anonymous usage data.
Attribution icon. Activate to show attribution dialog.
Map compass. Activate to reset the map rotation to North.
Showing a Map created with Mapbox. Scroll by dragging two fingers. Zoom by pinching two fingers.
Location View. This shows your location on the map.
Provided OfflineRegionDefinition doesn\'t fit the world bounds: %s

Please refer to the following content to find the drone:
 1. The drone is connected to the remote controller
 If the drone is connected to the remote controller, you can observe the surrounding environment of the drone through the video transmission feeds to see whether there are rocks, trees, buildings and other landmark objects at the crash site of the drone, and then determine the approximate location of the drone in combination with the GPS coordinates in Find My Drone.
 2. The drone is disconnected from the remote controller
 1) In Settings - > Safety, check the preset drone behavior after signal lost (the default setting is Return).
 If you choose Return after the drone loses connection, it is recommended that you wait for the drone to return to the HOME point. If the drone does not return after a certain period of time, it is recommended that you follow the return path to search for the drone.
 If you choose Landing after the drone loses connection, it is recommended that you look for the drone near the GPS coordinates of the crash site.
 If you choose Hovering after the drone loses connection, it is recommended that you try to operate or find the drone near the the GPS coordinates of the crash site.
 2) In Find My Drone interface, you can check the last GPS coordinates of the drone, and determine the approximate crash site of the drone through its last GPS coordinates, and search for it nearby.
 Note:
 [1] If you still can't determine the crash site of the drone through Find My Drone, please contact Potensic technical support support@potensic.com by email.
 [2] If the crash site is loacted, but it is at a place that is difficult to retrieve, such as in the water, on the roof of a building, on a cliff, etc., please do not risk yourself, and call for professional assistance to ensure personal safety.

Please refer to the following content to find the drone:
 1. The drone is connected to the remote controller
 If the drone is connected to the remote controller, you can observe the surrounding environment of the drone through the video transmission feeds to see whether there are rocks, trees, buildings and other landmark objects at the crash site of the drone, and then determine the approximate location of the drone in combination with the GPS coordinates in Find My Drone.
 2. The drone is disconnected from the remote controller
 In Find My Drone interface, you can check the last GPS coordinates of the drone, and determine the approximate crash site of the drone through its last GPS coordinates, and search for it nearby.
 Note:
 [1] If you still can't determine the crash site of the drone through Find My Drone, please contact Potensic technical support support@potensic.com by email.
 [2] If the crash site is loacted, but it is at a place that is difficult to retrieve, such as in the water, on the roof of a building, on a cliff, etc., please do not risk yourself, and call for professional assistance to ensure personal safety.

Please refer to the following content to find the drone:
 1. The drone is connected to the remote controller (the drone has crashed)
 1) If the drone is connected to the remote controller, you can observe the surrounding environment of the drone through the video transmission feeds to see whether there are rocks, trees, buildings and other landmark objects at the crash site of the drone, and then determine the approximate location of the drone in combination with the GPS coordinates in Find My Drone.
 2) When reaching the proximity of the crash site, and if the drone is connected to the remote controller, tap the Turn on Beeping button on Find My Drone interface, and the drone will beep to assist your search.
 2. The drone is disconnected from the remote controller
 1) In Settings - > Safety, check the preset drone behavior after signal lost (the default setting is Return).
 If you choose Return after the drone loses connection, it is recommended that you wait for the drone to return to the HOME point. If the drone does not return after a certain period of time, it is recommended that you follow the return path to search for the drone.
 If you choose Landing after the drone loses connection, it is recommended that you look for the drone near the GPS coordinates of the crash site.
 If you choose Hovering after the drone loses connection, it is recommended that you try to operate or find the drone near the the GPS coordinates of the crash site.
 2) In Find My Drone interface, you can check the last GPS coordinates of the drone, and determine the approximate crash site of the drone through its last GPS coordinates, and search for it nearby.
 Note:
 [1] If you still can't determine the crash site of the drone through Find My Drone, please contact Potensic technical support support@potensic.com by email.
 [2] If the crash site is loacted, but it is at a place that is difficult to retrieve, such as in the water, on the roof of a building, on a cliff, etc., please do not risk yourself, and call for professional assistance to ensure personal safety.
Please refer to the following content to find the drone:
After receiving your comments, we will actively make reasonable improvements and solve related problems. Thanks for your feedback.
Short press and then long press the power button to start the drone.

1. Short press then long press the power button for 7 seconds. The left and right indicators flash alternately.
2. Press down the remote controller’s right joystick and power button at the same time for 2s, the remote controller emits 2 \'beep\' sounds, and the indicator flashes quickly

3. After pairing is completed, the indicator of the remote control will stay on, and the 4 indicators of the drone will stay on (GPS signal is weak) or the front lights on and the taillights flashing slowly (GPS mode).

1. Short press then long press the power button until a beep is emitted. \n2. After powering on the drone, short press power button for 5 times to enter the pairing mode. The left and right indicators of the drone flash alternately.

By registering your account, providing us with relevant information (including personal and non-personal information), visiting our website, or using our products or services, or clicking on the relevant confirmation keys, or otherwise reasonably understanding that you have agreed, you may be deemed to have done such consent, i.e., accepted and agreed to this Privacy Policy. Agree that Botan Innovation may collect, store, process, disclose, share and use your personal information and other non-personal information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. 
This policy enables you to understand the following: 
a. How we collect and use your personal information 
b. How do we share, transfer and publicly disclose your personal information 
c. Your rights 
d. How do we deal with children's personal information 
e. How to transfer your personal information around the world 
f. How to update this policy 
g. How to contact us 
 
Personal information refers to all kinds of information recorded electronically or in other ways that can identify a particular natural person's identity or reflect the activities of a particular natural person independently or in combination with other information. (1)Registration 
In order to complete the account creation, you may need to provide us with the following information: your email address, the user name and password created and other basic information. 
In order to provide you with better services such as your name, birthday, gender, location, work industry, etc. during registration or after account creation, some additional information (such as your name, birth date, gender, location, etc.) may need to be provided by you. If you do not provide this information, it will not affect the basic functions of your Botan Innovation products and services. 
(2)Purchase and delivery of products or services 
When you purchase Botan Innovation products and services, we collect personal information, including but not limited to: delivery details, bank account number, credit card details, billing address, credit verification and other financial information, contact and communication records.If you do not provide this information, you will not be able to purchase our products and services. 
(3)About using Botan Innovation products or services 
In the course of your use of our products and services, in order to ensure the proper implementation and use of the corresponding functions, we may need you to provide us with the following information: the geographic environment and location information of your device, configuration information of your device, shared text or pictures, flight data (including sensor data, navigation system data, device data, control data, flight restriction data, etc.) Environmentally aware visual data, etc; when you ask Botan Innovation to provide after-sales services etc.), we may also collect usage log records of your products, IP addresses to access our products or services, time information, etc. If you refuse to provide this information, we will not be able to provide you with the appropriate services, but will not affect your use of other products and services for other functions. 
(4)Improve the quality of our services and provide you with more closely related advertisements 
In order to provide you with better service, we may collect information you provide when you contact our service team, such as online surveys you take part in, complaints about Botan Innovation and other interactions with Botan Innovation. We may ask you to provide personal information, including, but not limited to, your name, occupation, gender, date of birth, ID number, etc.Phone number, zip code, area code, e-mail address, mailing address, income and property status, health status, consumption, etc., and, with your consent, will provide you with advertisements that you may be interested in based on the above information. If you do not wish to receive such information, you may contact us to unsubscribe. 
(5) Develop data analysis and research to improve our products or services 
The personal information we collect will be used to provide you with information content and services, such as showing you your own flight record information. 
The personal information we collect may be used to develop, manage, evaluate and improve our business (including developing new products and services; enhancing and improving our services; managing communications; analyzing products; conducting data analysis; performing accounting, auditing and other internal functions). Generally, we only use comprehensive and statistical information. 
(6) To safeguard the interests of the State, the public and you and others 
You are fully aware that we have the right to collect and use your personal information without your authorized consent in the following circumstances: 
A. Information relating to national security and national defense security; 
B. It is related to public safety, public health and important public interests; 
C. Relevant to criminal investigation, prosecution, trial and execution of judgments; 
D. For the purpose of safeguarding the vital legal rights and interests such as the life and property of the subject of personal information or other individuals, but it is difficult to obtain his consent; 
E. The personal information collected is made public by the subject of personal information to the public by himself/herself; 
F. Personal information collected from lawfully disclosed information, such as legitimate news reports, government information disclosure, etc. 
G. Required for signing a contract at your request; 
H. Required for maintaining the safe and stable operation of the products and/or services provided, such as the detection and disposal of failures of products and/or services; 
I. Required for legitimate news reporting; 
J. When it is necessary for an academic research institution to conduct statistical or academic research based on the public interest and to provide the results of an academic study or description to the outside world, the personal information contained in the results shall be de-identified. 
K. Other circumstances prescribed by laws and regulations. 
For sensitive information about yourself, such as your race, religion, gender orientation, etc., when you use our products or services, you may upload or publish such sensitive information through public channels. Please handle this kind of sensitive personal information carefully. 
 
Botan Innovation will use your personal information in strict accordance with this Privacy Policy and all subsequent updates. 
(1) About sharing 
To ensure the security of your information, Botan Innovation will not share your personal information with any company, organization or individual other than our company, except for the following situations: 
A. If you need to share your information, we will not share your personal information until we have your explicit consent. 
B. We will share your information at the request of laws, regulations or government authorities. 
C. In order to provide you with a more satisfactory service, it is possible that your personal information will be shared with our affiliates, and your authorized consent will be sought again if the affiliates wish to use your personal information. 
(2) About Transferring and public disclosure 
a. If it is necessary to transfer and publicly disclose your information, we will obtain your explicit consent before transferring and publicly disclosing your personal information. 
b. In case of merger, acquisition or bankruptcy liquidation involving the transfer of personal information, we will require the new company or organization holding your personal information to continue to be bound by this privacy policy, otherwise we will require the company or organization to ask you for permission again. 
 
In accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, standards and practices of other countries and regions in China, we guarantee you the following rights to your personal information: 
(1) The right to access your personal information 
(2) The right to correct your personal information 
(3) The right to delete your personal information 
You may request us to delete personal information in the following situations: 
A.If our actions in dealing with personal information violate laws and regulations; 
B.If we collect and use your personal information without your consent; 
C.If our handling of personal information violates our agreement with you; 
D.If you cancel your account; 
E.If we no longer provide you with products or services: 
For security reasons, we may not be able to delete the information from the backup system immediately. We will also store your personal information securely until the backup can be cleared or anonymous. If there are any errors in the personal information we process about you, you have the right to contact us and ask us to make corrections. 
(4)Identify and process your request 
Due to security issues, in order to process your request, you may be asked to verify your identity before processing your request, you may need to provide written requests, etc. to prove your identity. 
In principle, no fees will be charged for your reasonable requests, but for repeated requests that exceed the reasonable limits, we will charge a cost fee as appropriate. We may reject requests that are unreasonably duplicated, require too many technical means (for example, the need to develop a new system or radically change current practices), pose a risk to the legitimate rights and interests of others, or are highly impractical (for example, involving information stored on backup tapes). 
In the following cases, we will not be able to respond to your request as required by law and regulations: 
A. Requests directly related to national security and national defense security; 
B. Requests directly related to public safety, public health and important public interests; 
C. Requests directly related to criminal investigation, prosecution, trial and execution of judgments; 
D. There is sufficient evidence that you are subjectively malicious or abusing your rights; 
E Responding to your request will result in serious damage to the legitimate rights and interests of you or other individuals or organizations. 
F.Requests involve business secrets. 
 
Users under the age of 14 can browse Botan Innovation official website. However, we declare that our products, websites and services are mainly for adults and that children cannot create their own user accounts and use related products and services without the consent and supervision of their parents or guardians. 
If we find that we have inadvertently collected personal information of a child under the age of 14 without the consent of the guardian mentioned above, we will take measures to delete such information as soon as possible. 
 
In principle, personal information that we collect and generate within the territory of the People's Republic of China will be stored within the territory of the People's Republic of China. 
Since we provide products or services through resources and servers all over the world, this means that your personal information may be transferred to or accessed from overseas jurisdictions in the country/region in which you use the product or service. We will conduct a safety assessment in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations before transfer. 
Such jurisdictions may have different data protection laws or even no relevant laws. In such cases, we will ensure that your personal information is adequately protected within the territory of the People's Republic of China. 
 
This privacy policy may change and is subjected to adjustment. This Privacy Policy is updated regularly without notice to reflect changes in personal information protection policies and laws and regulations. We will indicate the date of the most recent update on the updated Privacy Policy page. Without your express consent, we will not impair your rights under this Privacy Policy unless you are notified or posted a website announcement through the e-mail address you provide. We will also provide more significant notifications of major changes. 
If you continue to use Botan Innovation products and services after this policy update takes effect, you have fully read, understood and accepted the updated policy and are willing to be bound by it. 
 
If you have any questions, comments or suggestions regarding this privacy policy, please email support@potensic.com 
If you are not satisfied with our response, or our personal information processing have harmed your legitimate rights and interests, you can complain or report to the regulatory authorities such as Netcom, telecommunications, public security, industry and commerce.
Push up the throttle and start flying.
When locking the target in QuickShots, the gimbal pitch angle needs to be between -75° ~ -15°, please adjust the drone position and gimbal pitch angle.

The drone flies around the subject in an oval path, ascending as it flies away from its starting point to the farthest distance and descending as it flies backward.\nMake sure that the flight path is free of obstacles.
The drone circles around the subject starting from current position.\nMake sure that the flight path is free of obstacles.
Poor GPS signal, unable to activate QuickShots.
The drone flies backward and ascends with the camera locked on the subject.\nMake sure that the flight path is free of obstacles.
The drone ascends vertically with the camera pointing downward at the subject.\nMake sure that the flight path is free of obstacles.
The drone ascends and spirals around the subject.\nMake sure that the flight path is free of obstacles.

Remote controller and drone are successfully connected

1. Ensure that the drone is always in frequency pairing state (the tail light flashes green quickly).
2. Keep the remote controller and the drone close during the pairing process, and do not move them.
3. Do not perform other irrelevant operations during the frequency pairing process.
4. Stay away from strong interference environment.
The drone is landing. You can push the control sticks to adjust the landing position.

The back calibration is complete. Please replace the uncalibrated side of the aircraft and perform a static calibration on this new side.
The nose-down side calibration is completed. Please replace the uncalibrated side of the aircraft and perform a static calibration on this new side.
The drone\'s left side calibration is complete. Please replace the uncalibrated side of the aircraft and perform a static calibration on this new side.
The horizontal calibration is completed, please replace the uncalibrated side of the aircraft and perform a static calibration on this new side.
The drone\'s right side calibration is complete. Please replace the uncalibrated side of the aircraft and perform a static calibration on this new side.
The nose-up side calibration is completed. Please replace the uncalibrated side of the aircraft and perform a static calibration on the new side.
The picture shows the top view during calibration, and the six sides of calibration are in no particular order.
During the test, please lay the uncalibrated side horizontally on the ground. The green light of the aircraft will remain on.

What is six-side calibration?\n The six-side calibration is to correct the inaccuracy of aircraft parameters due to impact, temperature difference, etc. The process of correcting the current errors after obtaining the parameters after resting the aircraft on the six sides. Performing six-side calibration can make the drone fly more stable and return to home more accurate. The calibration takes about 2 minutes, click OK to start the calibration immediately.
During the drone back calibration, please keep the aircraft level and stand still on the ground. During the calibration, the aircraft green lights flash alternately and quickly.
During the calibration with the nose facing down, please keep the top of the aircraft level and stand still on the ground. The aircraft green lights flash alternately and quickly.
During the drone\'s left side calibration, please keep the top of the aircraft level and stand still on the ground. During the calibration, the aircraft green lights flash alternately and quickly.
During the horizontal calibration, please keep the drone above the ground and stand still. During the calibration, the green lights of the drone flash alternately and quickly.
During the drone\'s right side calibration, please keep the top of the aircraft level and stand still on the ground. During the calibration, the aircraft green lights flash alternately and quickly.
During the calibration with the nose facing up, please keep the top of the aircraft level and stand still on the ground. The aircraft green lights flash alternately and quickly.

New firmware detected, click here to download.
Please meet the following conditions before upgrading
For other issues, you can submit your feedback in the App or contact the customer support.
If the whole update process gets stuck, or the App prompts the upgrade failed, you can refer to the following steps to troubleshooting.
Before upgrading, make sure that the battery level of the drone is ≥30% and that of the remote controller is ≥2 bars. If the battery level is insufficient, please charge the device before upgrading.

Before upgrading, make sure the network connection of your smartphone is accessible, otherwise the firmware download will fail. If the firmware download fails, use another phone with the same or different operating system and try to upgrade again.

During the update process, the firmware needs to be transmitted to different devices. To avoid transmission problems, make sure that the distance between the remote controller and the drone is kept within 1 meter and away from areas with signal interference (such as computers, routers, etc.).
During the upgrade process, do not operate the drone and the remote controller (e.g., turn off the devices, unplug the adapter cable, etc.), unless you are prompted, and keep the devices stationary.
Not removing the gimbal cover will cause the upgrade to fail. Before upgrading, check whether the gimbal cover has been removed and make sure there are no obstacles around the gimbal.
1. Check whether the battery level of the devices are sufficient
2. Check whether the network connection of your smartphone is accessible
3. Check whether there is any interference nearby and whether the distance between the drone and the remote controller is too far
4. Check whether the devices are stationary when upgrading
5. If you own a drone with 3-axis gimbal, make sure to remove the gimbal cover before updating the firmware.
Feedback: The upgrade failed with the error code %d.
Feedback failed, please try again later.
Feedback failed, please check your network connection and try again.
Feedback is submitted successfully. We will contact you via email within 48 hours.
To acquire the reason for the upgrade failure, you can tap Submit, and the App will automatically upload the relevant upgrade logs, or you can contact the customer support via email.
Update failed. You may retry the update or submit your feedback of the issue via Homepage-Me-Feedback
If the upgrade fails, you can retry the upgrade or tap Feedback to submit your feedback.
